content: I'll try to keep my captions and descriptions concise and engaging, and make sure to include relevant hashtags and calls-to-action. I'll also experiment with different tones and voices to see what works best for my brand. Since I've had a particularly good night at the Tuesday evening night market two weeks ago, selling around $300 worth of candles and soaps, I might mention that in my captions to build credibility and trust with my audience. Do you have any tips on how to share user-generated content and encourage more of it?
